woldsvaults:default.NAME: Test Recipe
woldsvaults:default.DESCRIPTION: This should never be seen in normal gameplay.

woldsvaults:standard_trinket_pouch.NAME: Standard Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:standard_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: An improved trinket pouch that can store one of each trinket type. Unlocked by quest book at Level 75.

woldsvaults:light_trinket_pouch.NAME: Arcane Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:light_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two blue trinkets and one green trinket. Obtained by slaying Wold in a level 100 Vault.

woldsvaults:heavy_trinket_pouch.NAME: Mercenary's Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:heavy_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two red trinkets and one green trinket. Obtained by finding it on a Dungeon Pedestal.

woldsvaults:explorer_trinket_pouch.NAME: Explorer's Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:explorer_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two green trinkets and one blue trinket. Obtained by finding it on a Vendor Pedestal.

woldsvaults:wizard_trinket_pouch.NAME: Wizard's Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:wizard_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two blue trinkets and one red trinket. Unlocked by casting 250 abilities in a single level 80+ vault.

woldsvaults:slayer_trinket_pouch.NAME: Slayer's Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:slayer_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two red trinkets and one blue trinket. Unlocked by slaying a Boss in a level 100 Rune Boss vault.

woldsvaults:looters_trinket_pouch.NAME: Looter's Dream Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:looters_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store THREE green trinkets. Unlocked by opening 15 treasure rooms in a single level 100+ vault.

woldsvaults:warrior_trinket_pouch.NAME: Warrior Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:warrior_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store THREE red trinkets. Can be obtained from Rare Gateway rewards.

woldsvaults:hyper_trinket_pouch.NAME: Hyper Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:hyper_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store THREE blue trinkets. Obtainable by getting a Platinum Trophy when defeating The Herald.

woldsvaults:prismatic_trinket_pouch.NAME: Prismatic Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:prismatic_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: The premier and ultimate trinket pouch, capable of holding 2 of each type of trinket. Obtained by unlocking the Prestige Power for it.

woldsvaults:zephyr_charm.NAME: Zephyr Charm
woldsvaults:zephyr_charm.DESCRIPTION: An incredibly powerful unbreakable blue trinket that greatly improves your movement in vaults.

woldsvaults:treasure_jewel.NAME: Treasured Jewel
woldsvaults:treasure_jewel.DESCRIPTION: A splendid jewel that will let you mine treasure chests instead of opening them! Obtained after opening 10 treasure rooms.

woldsvaults:shattering_jewel.NAME: Shattering Jewel
woldsvaults:shattering_jewel.DESCRIPTION: An earth shattering relevation that lets you mine all chests as if they were wooden chests. Obtained the first time you complete a Corrupted vault.
